import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import SEOHead from './SEOHead'; import { Mail, Phone, Linkedin, Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, Send, MessageCircle } from 'lucide-react'; const ContactPage = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ fullName: '', email: '', phone: '', company: '', service: '', message: '' }); const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); const handleInputChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsSubmitting(true); await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1000)); console.log('Form submitted:', formData); setFormData({ fullName: '', email: '', phone: '', company: '', service: '', message: '' }); setIsSubmitting(false); alert('تم إرسال رسالتك بنجاح! سنتواصل معك قريباً.'); }; return (
{/* Page Header */}
